name: Drowning (itch) (Skully B)
description:
Developed for the 2021 Rainbow Game Jam, based on the theme liberation.

You must save people who have been trapped in a cage and dropped into the ocean to drown.

Liberate all the people in the area while avoiding creatures that can harm you.

Web build doesn't appear to be working in Chrome... So I've also provided a downloadable for Windows
